OOC: Enter Lord Elder!

In the center of the Ark's main command center Lord Elder, the leader
of the Watchers and at the moment, the lone guardian of the Ark stood
watching different computer screens, indulging one his favorite past
times, examining the cosmos. From as far back as he could remember he
had always had a fascination with anything new, the stars, new
planets, new places, he was a machine designed to explore.

On the screens were different views of space, a few of them were
centered on the moon, as he silently wondered exactly what was going
on there, what were the minions planning? Unfortunately he had no
ability to peer into their very base, although he could at times make
out the dim reddish reflections from the moon, the base of Unicron's
minions.

With a sigh he looked at another monitor, this one trained in a
different direction. He couldn't necessarily see the Predacon base
from his position, but he knew where it was and he always kept a
sensor beam in their direction. Even with the ongoing skirmishes from
the minions, you can never put it past the Predacons to make an attack
as well.

He pursed his lips slightly as he looked at the screen. He had seen
Rat Trap going off in that direction. He hadn't said anything to the
Maximal, as Rat Trap was usually more than able to take care of
himself, but it had been a while since he had checked in.

With a casual movement Lord Elder reached down to the console in front
of him and opened an encrypted maximal channel, "Rat Trap! This is
Lord Elder, come it. What is your Status?"

(Tag)

Preston
(Lord Elder)
